entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Common sense? Trump's lack of common sense is what got us in the mess. 

Trump put American lives behind the economy. 

120,000 dead and more than 20 million still unemployed.

We are recovering from the impact of Trump's failed response to the Coronavirus.
